name: Chempunk Chainsword
passive: Putrify: Dealing physical damage to enemy champions inflicts them with 40% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.
description: Item that provides Attack Damage, Health, Ability Haste, Ability Haste. Passive effect: Dealing physical damage to enemy champions inflicts them with 40% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.. Great for champions looking to maximize their damage output.
tips: Great for champions who want to maximize their damage output
Synergizes well with other damage items for burst potential
Consider building this when ahead to snowball your advantage
Provides excellent sustain in lane and during fights
The healing/lifesteal helps you stay in fights longer
